translation.Sistema desenvolvido no âmbito do Projet: System developed under the project 'MovTour - Tourism and Culture and for Society'.
translation.Desenvolvido em parceria entre o Institu: Developed in partnership between the Polytechnic Institute of Tomar, the Polytechnic Institute of Santarém and the Center for Social Studies of the University of Coimbra and co-financed by the Operational Program for Competitiveness and Internationalization, Portugal 2020 and the European Union through the European Regional Development Fund.
